thread.title: Great Hotel and nice staff in Paris
thread.title_full: Great Hotel and nice staff in Paris - Review of Maison Albar Hotel Opera Diamond, BW Premier Collection, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Traveller83500
title: Great Hotel and nice staff in Paris
text:
What a confortable hotel and what professional staff in this place.
It's always a pleasure to come back in Maison Albar Opera Diamond
I'll come back and enjoy the large rooms
To be continued ...
A special thanks to the barman. Nice cocktails and always in a rich exchange in talking
